00047 /* Private Macros ------------------------------------------------------------- */
00052 /* --------------------- BIT DEFINITIONS -------------------------------------- */
00053 /**********************************************************************
00054 * IR register definitions
00055 **********************************************************************/
00057 #define PWM_IR_PWMMRn(n)        ((uint32_t)((n<4)?(1<<n):(1<<(n+4))))
00058 
00059 #define PWM_IR_PWMCAPn(n)               ((uint32_t)(1<<(n+4)))
00060 
00061 #define PWM_IR_BITMASK                  ((uint32_t)(0x0000073F))
00062 
00063 /**********************************************************************
00064 * TCR register definitions
00065 **********************************************************************/
00067 #define PWM_TCR_BITMASK                         ((uint32_t)(0x0000000B))
00068 #define PWM_TCR_COUNTER_ENABLE      ((uint32_t)(1<<0)) 
00069 #define PWM_TCR_COUNTER_RESET       ((uint32_t)(1<<1)) 
00070 #define PWM_TCR_PWM_ENABLE          ((uint32_t)(1<<3)) 
00072 /**********************************************************************
00073 * CTCR register definitions
00074 **********************************************************************/
00075 
00076 #define PWM_CTCR_BITMASK                        ((uint32_t)(0x0000000F))
00077 
00078 #define PWM_CTCR_MODE(n)                ((uint32_t)(n&0x03))
00079 
00080 #define PWM_CTCR_SELECT_INPUT(n)        ((uint32_t)((n&0x03)<<2))
00081 
00082 /**********************************************************************
00083 * MCR register definitions
00084 **********************************************************************/
00086 #define PWM_MCR_BITMASK                         ((uint32_t)(0x001FFFFF))
00087 
00088 #define PWM_MCR_INT_ON_MATCH(n)     ((uint32_t)(1<<(((n&0x7)<<1)+(n&0x07))))
00089 
00090 #define PWM_MCR_RESET_ON_MATCH(n)   ((uint32_t)(1<<(((n&0x7)<<1)+(n&0x07)+1)))
00091 
00092 #define PWM_MCR_STOP_ON_MATCH(n)    ((uint32_t)(1<<(((n&0x7)<<1)+(n&0x07)+2)))
00093 
00094 /**********************************************************************
00095 * CCR register definitions
00096 **********************************************************************/
00098 #define PWM_CCR_BITMASK                         ((uint32_t)(0x0000003F))
00099 
00100 #define PWM_CCR_CAP_RISING(n)           ((uint32_t)(1<<(((n&0x2)<<1)+(n&0x1))))
00101 
00102 #define PWM_CCR_CAP_FALLING(n)          ((uint32_t)(1<<(((n&0x2)<<1)+(n&0x1)+1)))
00103 
00104 #define PWM_CCR_INT_ON_CAP(n)           ((uint32_t)(1<<(((n&0x2)<<1)+(n&0x1)+2)))
00105 
00106 /**********************************************************************
00107 * PCR register definitions
00108 **********************************************************************/
00110 #define PWM_PCR_BITMASK                 (uint32_t)0x00007E7C
00111 
00112 #define PWM_PCR_PWMSELn(n)      ((uint32_t)(((n&0x7)<2) ? 0 : (1<<n)))
00113 
00114 #define PWM_PCR_PWMENAn(n)      ((uint32_t)(((n&0x7)<1) ? 0 : (1<<(n+8))))
00115 
00116 /**********************************************************************
00117 * LER register definitions
00118 **********************************************************************/
00120 #define PWM_LER_BITMASK                         ((uint32_t)(0x0000007F))
00121 
00122 #define PWM_LER_EN_MATCHn_LATCH(n)   ((uint32_t)((n<7) ? (1<<n) : 0))
00123 
00124 /* ---------------- CHECK PARAMETER DEFINITIONS ---------------------------- */
00126 #define PARAM_PWMx(n)   (((uint32_t *)n)==((uint32_t *)LPC_PWM1))
00127 
00129 #define PARAM_PWM1_MATCH_CHANNEL(n)             ((n>=0) && (n<=6))
00130 
00132 #define PARAM_PWM1_CHANNEL(n)                   ((n>=1) && (n<=6))
00133 
00135 #define PARAM_PWM1_EDGE_MODE_CHANNEL(n)                 ((n>=2) && (n<=6))
00136 
00138 #define PARAM_PWM1_CAPTURE_CHANNEL(n)   ((n==0) || (n==1))
00139 
00141 #define PARAM_PWM_INTSTAT(n)    ((n==PWM_INTSTAT_MR0) || (n==PWM_INTSTAT_MR1) || (n==PWM_INTSTAT_MR2) \
00142 || (n==PWM_INTSTAT_MR3) || (n==PWM_INTSTAT_MR4) || (n==PWM_INTSTAT_MR5) \
00143 || (n==PWM_INTSTAT_MR6) || (n==PWM_INTSTAT_CAP0) || (n==PWM_INTSTAT_CAP1))
00144

00243         PWM_COUNTER_PCAP1_1

00249 typedef enum {

00251     PWM_COUNTER_FALLING = 2,    
00252     PWM_COUNTER_ANY = 3                 
00253 } PWM_COUNTER_EDGE_OPT;
00254

00256 || (n==PWM_COUNTER_ANY))

00263     PWM_CHANNEL_DUAL_EDGE               
00264 } PWM_CHANNEL_EDGE_OPT;
00265

00267

00272         PWM_MATCH_UPDATE_NEXT_RST                       
00274 } PWM_MATCH_UPDATE_OPT;
00275 
00276 #define PARAM_PWM_MATCH_UPDATE(n)       ((n==PWM_MATCH_UPDATE_NOW) || (n==PWM_MATCH_UPDATE_NEXT_RST))
